Title: Relates to the use of facial recognition and biometric information for determining probable cause
Summary: Prohibits the use of facial recognition and biometric information as the sole factor in determining the existence of probable cause to place in custody or arrest an individual.
LawCode: Ren ยง837-x to be ยง837-y, add ยง837-z, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the use of facial recognition and biometric information for determining probable cause
